item.description:
Choosing Relationships Wisely

Do you tend to choose relationships unwisely? Do you think you are a good relationship person and keep choosing people that are ambivalent, hurtful or are poor communicators? Learn how to choose a friend or partner like you would choose well a job or place to live. Learn to use your intuition, "interview" and make sure you are with a person who is mutually beneficial.

7:30-9:30pm

(Cost $30 - Sliding scale to $20)


Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, is a relationship and communication coach and therapist with 30 years experience. He teaches the Enneagram, Myers Briggs and other systems to help people understand and bridge differences. He also does phone consults, teaches and coaches in organizations to help people work together effectively and is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram.

Organize a group for your friends, family or associates.

781 648 3737
herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com
item.name: Choosing Relationships Wisely
